bundle.title: *Click Here for more Info!*
bundle.description:
[**LBRY**](https://lbry.com) is a protocol providing fully decentralized network for the discovery, distribution, and payment of data. It utilizes the [**LBRY blockchain**](https://lbry.com/what#the-network) as a global namespace and database of digital content. Blockchain entries contain searchable content metadata, identities, and rights and access rules. 
[_**Get the app here**_](https://lbry.com/get)

The [LBRY White Paper](https://spec.lbry.com/) defines the LBRY protocol, its components, and how they fit together. 
This document assumes that the reader is familiar with distributed hash tables (DHTs), the BitTorrent protocol, Bitcoin, and blockchain technology in general. It does not attempt to document these technologies or explain how they work.
Please don't request free coins or invites, we have a strict policy against begging. Further offenses will result in removal from the chat.

!spamreward.description: Don't send DM to LBRY Staff

bundle.description: If you are here for Rewards approval, please do not message any team members or ask about approval in any channels. Failure to follow this simple rule may result in your removal.
Even though LBRY is in Open Beta, it's still beta software! There will be bugs and issues to be worked out. Thanks for your patience!
The official GitHub for LBRY is [github.com/lbryio](https://github.com/lbryio)
**Installers for the LBRY app are available for download** [**HERE**](https://lbry.com/get)
Installers for the LBRY daemon are available for download [**HERE**](https://github.com/lbryio/lbry-sdk/releases)
You can find details about the folders your LBRY files are stored in at [lbry.com/faq/lbry-directories](https://lbry.com/faq/lbry-directories)
These questions and many more have been answered on the [FAQ Page](https://lbry.com/faq/)

Want to help develop and contribute to the LBRY Project?
Check out **[GUIDE](https://lbry.tech/contribute)** to help you get you started.
Check out the newsfeed **[HERE](https://lbry.com/news)**.

:warning: Hey, glad to see you love **LBRY** so much, but for the safety of our users we ask that you avoid using **Discord names** that include the word **LBRY**, names of **LBRY staff**, names of other **LBRY members** on the this server or any name that could be considered **deceptive**. This is to prevent impersonation and scams.
To get started mining LBC, we suggest reading the mining FAQ entry [**HERE**](https://lbry.com/faq/mining-credits).
Details about our stance on price can be found here: [lbry.com/news/acryptypical](https://lbry.com/news/acryptypical)

!youtuber.description: Are You a YouTuber Curious About LBRY?

bundle.description: Are you a YouTuber curious about LBRY? Have a look at [lbry.com/youtube](https://lbry.com/youtube)
We've created a small guide to help with the Publishing features of LBRY, check it out here: [lbry.com/faq/how-to-publish](https://lbry.com/faq/how-to-publish)
Please keep conversations on topic, or move random conversations to #random if you wish to continue

Names exist so that we can map a human readable and understandable word or term to a more difficult to remember number or ID. In the traditional domain system, names map to numerical ! addresses. In LBRY, names map to a unique, permanent ID representing a piece of digital content and/or a publisher identity. Learn more **[HERE](https://lbry.com/faq/naming)**

You can earn LBRY Credits for completing tasks as part of the LBRY Bounty Program, All bounties can be seen on the **[Bounty Home Page](https://lbry.com/bounty)**.
Bounties range from simple typo fixes to third party applications and custom projects.

Check out the **[RoadMap](https://lbry.com/roadmap)**, it only outlines past and anticipated technical changes, it does not cover other initiatives. Development was fast and furious among a small group prior to 0.6, and release notes are sparse.

Please see [lbry.com/faq/referrals](https://lbry.com/faq/referrals)  - Referral redemptions are currently in test mode and limited to ten. But you can see your entire referral history in your LBRY app.

[Rewards](https://lbry.com/faq/rewards) are given to legitimate users who are using the system (and in turn are testing things for us). In order to redeem rewards, you may need to verify your identity through phone number,credit card, or other manual methods. Learn how to verify by typing !verify or !cc
If you would like to be approved for rewards, please go to <#571001864271691805> and send a Direct Message to @RewardsBot#0287 saying

You can do this by right clicking on the name, and selecting Message. A LBRY mod will get back to you as soon as possible. We appreciate your patience. Only one account per email/ip/household is allowed access to LBRY Rewards. Check out our [Rewards FAQ](https://lbry.com/faq/rewards) to know more about rewards.
Rewards are different to referral bonuses. Rewards are given for testing the LBRY software and system. Referrals are given for sharing LBRY with the masses.

In an effort to limit abuse, newly invited LBRY users will be required to verify their identity via a credit card or by a manual approval process in order to be eligible for Rewards. Prepaid or virtual credit cards are disallowed. Certain countries (where we've previously seen abuse) are being denied, but that list may expand later on.  If you use Tor/Proxy/VPN, you also may be denied. If credit card verification does not work for you, please go to the <#363050496023592961> channel for assistance.
**Verification is purely optional and ONLY relevant for Rewards. The LBRY app can be used without providing CC information**
**Please See:https://lbry.com/faq/identity-requirements**

!logfile.description: How to Find LBRY App Log File?

bundle.description: You can find your log files by following the guide [HERE](https://lbry.com/faq/how-to-find-lbry-log-file)
Please see this guide on how to backup your wallet: [lbry.com/faq/how-to-backup-wallet](https://lbry.com/faq/how-to-backup-wallet)
Please see [lbry.com/faq/startup-troubleshooting](https://lbry.com/faq/startup-troubleshooting) if you are having trouble getting LBRY to start correctly.
Please see [lbry.com/faq/unable-to-stream](https://lbry.com/faq/unable-to-stream) if you are experiencing problems viewing **ANY** LBRY content.

The daemon uses ports **3333** and **4444**. It may interfere with mining software, Start the miner after the app and you should be okay. Also these ports need to be port forwarded on your router. Google is your friend there. 
 **Please see this tutorial on how to change ports : [lbry.com/faq/how-to-change-port](https://lbry.com/faq/how-to-change-port)**
Please see [lbry.com/faq/backup-data](https://lbry.com/faq/backup-data) for instructions on how to backup and/or migrate your LBRY data
Please see [lbry.com/faq/tipping](https://lbry.com/faq/tipping) for details about tipping in the LBRY app

[JiggyTom](https://spee.ch/5/jiggytomsuperhero.jpeg) is LBRY's very own superhero. He has special powers which enable him to seek out and fix almost any issue that might occur within planet LBRY. 

Use JiggyTom with care. Overuse may result in unforeseen consequences and a meltdown which could lead to thermonuclear LBRYian war. 

Make sure you show your appreciation for Jiggy and his team of superheros when they use superpowers to help you. And remember kids, stay safe and behave yourselves

Use Julie with care. Overuse may result in unforeseen consequences and a meltdown which could lead to thermonuclear LBRYian war.

Type `!tip help` or `!tips` to interact with our Tipbot which can be used to send and receive LBRY Credits (LBC). <#369896313082478594> should be used to talk to bots in order to avoid spamming other channels. 
Read our [Tipbot FAQ](https://lbry.com/faq/tipbot-discord) on how use the LBRY Discord Tipbot
LBRY is not yet out on this [platform](https://lbry.com/iOS), but will be soon. Enter your email to be notified when it is released!
Want to earn rewards for 3D printing nifty items? Explore our [3D Printing Program](https://lbry.com/3d-printing)

Currently, the translation of the LBRY application is in the experimental phase, we will inform you when it will be completed. If you are interested in helping us translate the app, take a look at the LBRY Transifex page [**HERE**](https://www.transifex.com/lbry/lbry-desktop/).
To see the status of LBRY services please visit the offical [LBRY Status](https://status.lbry.com/) webpage.

LBRY or lbry:// is a new protocol which allows anyone to build apps and APIs that use the LBRY blockchain, which is a fork of Bitcoin. The LBRY app, which is built on the LBRY protocol, allows creators to broadcast their content via the LBRY blockchain to anyone using a connected app or website, so it can be downloaded or advertised; a little like how BitTorrent works. Using the app or API, you can set a price for your content or give it away for free, like you do on YouTube but without the ads. It benefits the user because there's no ads and content isn't shaped or removed to fit a political narrative. For content creators there's no risk of demonetization and legal content can't be censored or removed. You can find out more on the [FAQ](https://lbry.com/faq), or ask anyone here for their experience!

**Read this First**|> [Important Notice!!](https://discordapp.com/channels/362322208485277697/363049604461232148/709762555677245600)
`Violating those rules will not be tolerated`
---
- What exact problem are you facing [**Describe Clearly**]
- What have you tried so far *to solve the issue*
- Your account or channel link [*if you have any*]
- Useful Screenshots regarding issue[*Of wallet/reward page/Error message*]
---

Piratebay.com is not related to The Pirate Bay torrent site. We use it for relaying users who accidently go there looking for content and pointing them towards an alternative, legal form of content sharing (LBRY). LBRY Inc. does not own the domain, it was lent to us by a community member. For the full reddit post about this topic, [Click Here!](https://www.reddit.com/r/lbry/comments/8i4lj9/why_do_you_own_piratebaycom/)
